casebody.data:
SYKES, et al.
v.
HEALTH NETWORK SOLUTIONS, INC., et al. 251PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 9, 2018 Robert E. Fields, III, Attorney at Law, Samuel Pinero, II, Attorney at Law, William A. Blancato, GAL Appellate Attorney, Leon E. Porter, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Sykes, Susan, et al.

Ellis B. Drew, III, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem.

Jennifer K. Van Zant, Attorney at Law, Benjamin R. Norman, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, W. Michael Dowling, Attorney at Law, for Health Network Solutions, Inc., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 9th of November 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of November 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 21st day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
